dcmPassword

  • - directive in module dcm-ui.password

Provides a password validator implementing modified Stanford password rules

Directive Info

  • This directive executes at priority level 0.

Usage

  • as attribute: 
    <ANY
  [dcm-password=""]>
...
</ANY>

Arguments

Param Type Details
dcm-password
(optional)
 string

pass in an object to override default validation settings
